question: “Ek Bharat, Shrestha Bharat” programme draws inspiration from the life of which freedom fighter?
explanation: The programme \"Ek Bharat, Shrestha Bharat” draws inspiration from the life of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel. It was launched by Narendra Modi on the occasion of the 140th birth anniversary of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel. The scheme aims to connect different states together by promoting the share of culture and language between them.
